doc.after: The villages in the valley have their own parish councils which have responsibility for local issues They also elect councillors to district councils e g Mendip and Somerset County Council or unitary authorities e g Bath and North East Somerset or North Somerset which have wider responsibilities for services such as education refuse and tourism
